library(leaflet)

sites <- sf::read_sf(sites_geo)

leaflet(
  data = sites,
  width = "100%") %>% 
  addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.OceanBasemap) %>% 
  addPolygons(
    label = ~name, 
    labelOptions = labelOptions(noHide = T))
